Articles.Content: Or have we no idea what is going to happen besides the wiki post?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68489-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-0-24-Update-Goals-Edition That's all anybody knows.

First rule about updates? Don't ask about updates!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68489-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-0-24-Update-Goals-Edition That's all anybody knows.

Pretty much this. This announcement is all that's currently been publicly released by the dev team, and the discussion of it is being held on the blog page. With that said, I'll go ahead and close this.
